Statute.Title: Postal Services Resumption and Continuation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Reprise et le maintien des services postaux, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2018, c. 25 (assent: 26.11.2018), this Act comes into force at noon Eastern Standard Time on the day after the day on which it receives royal assent, 27.11.2018
